name: Turntable Trouble
description:
My first game, made for an entry assignment for a study.
Find the centre of the vinyl before the music ends.
made by me
special thanks to
Plasuma (twitch.tv/plasuma) for helping, listening to my dev monologue and playtesting
The Gamemaker discord for helping me fix my code and teaching me this stuff
All the other playtesters who gave feedback after uploading it.
Nicolas Jeudy and DARK FANTASY STUDIO for the music.
